Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 82 not out, his 82nd T20I half-century
Hardik Pandya scored 40, his 40th T20I half-century
Shan Masood scored 52 for Pakistan, his 52nd T20I half-century
Shaheen Afridi hit a flat six at the MCG
Virat Kohli hit sixes in the 19th over, one of which was a no-ball
Karthik was stumped by Rizwan off Nawaz in the 20th over
Pandya was caught by Babar off Nawaz in the 20th over
Kohli was bowled by Nawaz but survived due to a free hit
Kohli hit a four and a six in the 19th over

India required 160 to win
Pakistan scored 159-7 in their innings
India won by 4 wickets with 0 balls to spare
Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam said at the toss that 160 would be a good score
India win the toss and will bowl
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli said 'It's a surreal atmosphere. I honestly have no words, I have no idea how that happened.'

Rohit Sharma said 'We knew it would not be an easy target on that pitch. We knew we would have to bat out of our skins. Virat and Hardik are experienced guys. Staying calm and taking it as deep as possible was critical, and they did that.'
Babar Azam said 'We started well in our bowling, and then all credit to Hardik Pandya and Virat Kohli. They shifted the momentum and finished the game well.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of a crowd of 90,293
The match was a thrilling display of fast bowling
The match was a spectacle that lived up to the occasion
The match was a memorable finish to the World Cup
